data.title: Where To Buy Animal Crossing: New Horizons And The Limited Edition Animal Crossing Switch Console
data.meta_description: The best bundles and bonuses, plus the Happy Home Paradise DLC - Animal Crossing: New Horizons will totally and utterly take over your life if you let it, ju...
data.text:
Animal Crossing: New Horizons will totally and utterly take over your life if you let it, just as previous entries in the sedate life-sim series have done.

If you're after more details about the game, feel free to check out our extensive guides to everything you need to know or read our review to see if it might be for you.

All set? Here are all the best places to buy Animal Crossing: New Horizons, the special edition Animal Crossing: New Horizons Switch console, and the Happy Home Paradise DLC...

Please note that some external links on this page are affiliate links, which means if you click them and make a purchase we may receive a small percentage of the sale. Please read our FTC Disclosure for more information.

Where To Buy Animal Crossing: New Horizons On Nintendo Switch

Animal Crossing: New Horizons Switch Bundles - North America

For North American readers looking for that absolutely lovely Animal Crossing: New Horizons Switch console bundle, there's one important thing to note: there is no 'bundle', as such. The console doesn't come with a download code for Animal Crossing: New Horizons in this region, so you'll want to buy the game separately if you can't resist this themed console. And who could blame you. Just look at it!

Animal Crossing: New Horizons On Nintendo Switch - North America

If you're all sorted when it comes to Switch hardware, you're probably after just the game. Here are the best places to pick up Animal Crossing: New Horizons which we've found from the big retailers.

Animal Crossing: New Horizons On Nintendo Switch - UK / Europe

Here are the best places to pick up Animal Crossing: New Horizons in the UK.

Animal Crossing: New Horizons Switch Bundles - UK / Europe

If you're in the market for a Switch console along with the game, the gorgeous Animal Crossing: New Horizons Switch is available, and this European bundle includes a download code for the game.

Alternatively, if you're after a Switch Lite or want something a little less 'colourful' should your Switch fall from your briefcase during a business presentation, there are other Animal Crossing Switch bundles with physical copies of the game to suit all tastes.

Animal Crossing: New Horizons Accessories

Of course, your new island life wouldn't be complete without a huge number of associated accessories and Animal Crossing themed goodies to pair with your shiny new purchase. From Animal Crossing screen protectors to colourful covers, pouches to packs, they're all rather tempting.

Here are our picks for the classiest accessories to either match your new console or spruce up your existing one with a little Animal Crossing joie de vivre.

Where to buy Animal Crossing: New Horizons Happy Home Paradise DLC

The Happy Home Paradise DLC is available to buy from your respective region's Nintendo eShop. Alternatively, you can purchase a download code for the expansion via Amazon via the link below.

Remember that the Happy Home Paradise DLC is also included with an annual subscription to the Nintendo Switch Online Expansion Pack.

Let us know below which of these delightful offerings proved too difficult to resist.

This article is part of our Animal Crossing: New Horizons walkthrough, which includes a Complete Fish List, Complete Bug List and Complete Sea Creatures List. If you're looking for specific fish or bug, we can tell you how to catch the elusive Coelacanth, Mahi-Mahi, Giant Trevally, Stringfish, Golden Trout and all the Sharks and Beetles, along with a full list of Critters leaving at the end of the month. We've also compiled a Complete Villager List and a Complete List of K.K. Slider Songs, as well as the Best Custom Design Codes and Islands we've found so far, and the best islands to visit using Dream Address Codes.
